item.title: Comcast to spin off NBCU cable TV channels
item.description: The new $7 billion company would reportedly include MSNBC, CNBC, Oxygen, E!, USA Network, Syfy, and Golf Channel.

item.title: Employees are spending the equivalent of a month’s grocery bill on the return to the office–and growing more resentful than ever, survey finds
item.description: The average employee returning to the office spends $561 per month–that's the average two-person household’s grocery bill in the U.S. for the entire m...

item.title: Here’s how escalating Russia tensions could impact markets and supply chains, according to experts
item.description: The conflict could affect natural resources used in the production of semiconductors.

item.title: Rene Magritte painting ‘Empire of Light’ nets auction record of $121 million at Christie’s in New York

item.title: Airline exodus leaves Israelis and their companies isolated
item.description: Of the 20 airlines that dominated the market before the war, Israeli companies are nearly the only ones remaining.
